title: Having problems with the client
body:
Hello there, i started to have some problems in game. I get attempting to recconect while my network is strong and working, i am even on youtube or skype while getting that problem, it happens rarely, but still....And crashes, not often, but it happened 3 times in 5 minutes once...
Can i know why?

replies.body: Even though your network is strong you can still have problems reaching a specific service or server, like the game server.  In this case I'm assuming you're losing comms with pvp.net.  You should still go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot whatever is causing the disconnect.  Let me know if you have any questions about that.
